    • Method Detail

      • appendCurrentTime

        public void appendCurrentTime(int[] nowSpots)
        Appends the current state of the spots to the end of the history file and tags it with the current date and time.
        Parameters:
        nowSpots - the current state of the lot

      • commitWeekData

        public void commitWeekData(int[][][] spots,
                           java.util.GregorianCalendar[] dates)
        This method modifies the history file completely, committing a whole new set of data.
        Parameters:
        spots - An array of integers that represents the new weeks worth of data
        dates - An array of GregorianCalendar objects that holds the corresponding dates for the days being committed

      • appendDay

        public void appendDay(int[][] spots,
                      java.util.GregorianCalendar date)
        This method adds a single day to the end of the history and removes the oldest day if the history is at max capacity
        Parameters:
        spots - An array of integers that represents a days worth of data
        dates - A GregorianCalendar object that holds the corresponding date for the day being committed

      • getDOM

        public void getDOM()
        Reads the history file and creates a new DOM object in the doc class variable

      • readData

        private void readData()
        This method retrieves the current parking history and stores it in the spots class variable

      • getWeekRaw

        public int[][][] getWeekRaw()
        This method reads the history file and returns last weeks parking data
        Returns:
        spots an array of integers that represents the previous weeks data

      • getDaysAgoRaw

        public int[][] getDaysAgoRaw(int numDaysAgo)
        Returns all parking data from a specified day in the past. If history is exceeded, oldest entry is used.
        Parameters:
        numDaysAgo - number of days in the past to look
        Returns:
        an array of integers that represents the parking data from the specified day

      • getAllPercents

        public double[][] getAllPercents()
        This method reads the history file and returns the last weeks percentage full data
        Returns:
        wPercents an array of double that represents the percentage full data of the last week

      • saveAsPlainText

        public void saveAsPlainText()
                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Prints the data to a human-readable plaintext file
        Parameters:
        parkingHistoryFile -
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • getDaysAgoPercents

        public int[] getDaysAgoPercents(int numDaysAgo)
        This method reads the history file and returns the specified days percentage full data
        Parameters:
        numDaysAgo - number of days in the past to look
        Returns:
        wPercents an array of double that represents the percentage full data of the specified day
